body_html:
The compatibility list comment is a bit cryptic, but perhaps it is acknowledging that the conv2d filter /weight order is incompatible. So, is there some plan to resolve the incompatibilities between tflite and tf operations (incuding these persisted filter/weight shape differences)?

https://www.tensorflow.org/lite/tf_ops_compatibility
"The following TensorFlow operations are usually mapped to their TensorFlow Lite counterparts:"
"tf.nn.conv2d - as long as the filter is constant"

"The following TensorFlow operations are usually mapped to their TensorFlow Lite counterparts:"
"tf.nn.conv2d - as long as the filter is constant"
body:
The compatibility list  comment  is a bit cryptic, but perhaps it is acknowledging that the conv2d filter /weight order is incompatible.   So, is there some plan to resolve the incompatibilities between tflite and tf operations (incuding these persisted filter/weight shape differences)?    

https://www.tensorflow.org/lite/tf_ops_compatibility
"The following TensorFlow operations are usually mapped to their TensorFlow Lite counterparts:"
"tf.nn.conv2d - as long as the filter is constant"
